title: Intrinsic effects of electrolytes on lithium metal deposition and dissolution investigated through a separator-free cell
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,1653-1661
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00245H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tomoki Takahashi, Di Wang, Jinkwang Hwang, Kazuhiko Matsumoto
A separator-free cell minimizing extraneous parameters and 48 different electrolytes varying in solvent, salt type, concentration, and additives are utilized to assess their influence on lithium deposition and dissolution.
